short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortless discovery of performances from your favourite artists

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop checking if your favourite artist is playing in the area. In less than 10 seconds MusicMate will permanently remove the hassle of concert-hunting and let you relax and enjoy the music instead.

Simply log in with your Spotify account, enter your location, and the distance you're willing to travel for a concert and you're good to go!

If the app detects that your currently listened artist is performing nearby you'll get a notification. You won't even have to search for tickets. View them by clicking on the "Show tickets" button in the notification or on the artist thumbnail in your recent discoveries. If you're in a rush, you can set a next-day reminder.

It's completely free and works even if you're listening to Spotify on your smartphone! No more missed chances. Save your time, energy, and money and let the performances find you.

----------------------------------------------------

By using this add-on, you agree to the musicMate privacy policy available at https://the-fun-place.vercel.app/musicMate/privacy-policy
